directions: Combine scallops, clementines, tomato, red onion, scallions, lemon juice, lime juice, garlic, cilantro, and olive oil in a large bowl. Season with salt. Refrigerate until flavors combine, stirring occasionally, about 2 hours.
ingredients: 1 tablespoon chopped cilantro, or to taste (optional)
title: Scallop Ceviche
